findings.title: Deployer Can Update Total Tax Up to 100%
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update total tax up to 100%, which can lead to potential manipulation and security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update marketing share up to 100%
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to update the marketing share up to 100%, which could lead to potential manipulation or exploitation.

findings.title: Deployer can release liquidity tokens after liquidity time lock is over
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to release liquidity tokens even after the liquidity time lock has expired.

findings.title: Deployer can distribute staked amount after liquidity time lock is over
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to distribute the staked amount after the liquidity time lock has expired.

findings.title: Deployer can collect liquidity tokens after liquidity time lock is over
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to collect liquidity tokens after the liquidity time lock has expired.

findings.title: Deployer can collect BNB from contract to development address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to collect BNB from the contract and transfer it to the development address.

findings.title: Deployer can collect BNB from marketing balance
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to collect BNB from the marketing balance, which could lead to unauthorized fund withdrawal.

findings.title: Deployer can update max buy transaction with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to update the maximum buy transaction amount to an unlimited value, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle sell time lock
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to toggle the sell time lock, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle sell cooldown time
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to toggle sell cooldown time, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle buy cooldown time
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to toggle buy cooldown time, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can block/unblock users
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to block or unblock users.

findings.title: Deployer Can Update Max Sell Transaction Amount Not Less Than 1%
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update the maximum sell transaction amount to a value not less than 1%, which may lead to unintended consequences or potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update max wallet amount
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to modify the maximum wallet amount without any restrictions.

findings.title: Deployer can renounce ownership
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to relinquish ownership of the contract, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can transfer ownership
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to transfer ownership of the contract, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle manual conversion of tokens
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to manually convert tokens, which could lead to unintended consequences or manipulation.

findings.title: Deployer can change development address receiver
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to change the development address receiver, which could lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Deployer can change marketing address receiver
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to update the marketing address receiver, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update max amount to swap tokens
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to update the maximum amount of tokens that can be swapped, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can exclude addresses from fees
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to exclude certain addresses from paying fees.

findings.title: Deployer can manually swap contract’s balance tokens
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to manually swap the contract's balance tokens, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update gas limit
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to update the gas limit, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Deployer can enable trading
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to enable trading, which may lead to unintended consequences or manipulation of the contract's behavior.

findings.title: Deployer can change liquidity token address
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to change the liquidity token address at will.

findings.title: Deployer can update liquidity time lock
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update the liquidity time lock, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment of the contract.
